QuestData.Title: Crippled Caravan
QuestData.Description: I'm getting reports that the botani have started leaving their bloom and attacking wandering travelers. This is most unusual.$b$bWe already dispatched a number of rangari to try and resolve this issue.$b$bA caravan from Azeroth passed through here recently, you should probably check on your people to ensure their safety.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Fiona's Caravan in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: Commander! Am I glad to see you.$b$bWe have a situation here.
